channel.title: kamata on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Kamata lesson
item.description: 12:16 Saturday 18 July 2015 JST Taught for two hours in Kamata, subbing for Diana. One of the students is a 65 year old woman who has a license to practice pharmacy (though she never used it (she got it to support herself in case she ever got divorced)), and is attending classes in chemistry now. inspiring!
